content: this mini crochet drawstring pouch is a cute and fun project it can hold your essentials and secure them with a drawstring closure it s great for beginners or non-beginners looking to use up scrap yarn and since it s a basic shape the colors can be altered to create different fruit-themed pouches the pattern is for a mini pouch the perfect size to hold airpods instructions to increase the size of the pouch are included requires 3 different color yarns for base leaves and seeds can be made all in 1 color for a basic drawstring pouch
